title: Death on Division: Norwich Police confirm victim’s death following shooting
content:
NORWICH – Few details have been released by authorities, but it has been confirmed that one is dead following a gunshot on Division Street Thursday.
According to the Norwich Police, it was at 6:07 p.m. when a radio call from the Chenango County 911 Dispatch Center reached the Norwich Police, the report stating there had been ‘an accidental shooting’ at a residence on Division Street in the City of Norwich.
